title: What are some examples of pragmatic approach? - Quora

response.answer_text: Deconstruction of the mind, matter or individual/s at hand is a good beginning. Slowing oneself down enough in order to consider variables and taking the time to hammer out who or what you are dealing with as well as from whence “baggage” comes on any side is imperative. Considering the time, place, financial status, belief system, education, societal standing social norms as well as other things which serve to build history from early on for each of us and all occurrences is an invaluable tool to assess anyone or anything. Proceeding in the game of life with patience minus ego takes practice. Digesting how or why another chooses one approach over another we perceive more rational can be tough. The fact of the matter is that we are only capable of giving what we have received. All we can do is strive to learn more each day, so as to step from the prisons wrought around us so as to further ourselves from suffocating myopia… Framing, framing and reframing throughout one’s journeys.
